title: Can't purchase more Tier 3 Runes
body:
Hey,

I can't seem to buy more Tier 3 runes, and I have researched abit on google, which states that it might be due to my space for runes being filled up by lower tier runes? If so can any Riot helper please do me the honor of removing them as such making space for buying more Tier 3 Runes.

In advance, 
Thank you

Kind regards, 
Lulu

replies.body: That may indeed be the case!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll work you to manually remove these older ones and clear up room for you.
That's a good question, as I believe with the discount we are not the only ones with the problem
I am having the same Exact Issue but how long should a response take? Just wondering.
